content:
Our flexible indoor meeting space comes prepared with Wi-Fi internet access, flat screen televisions, blackout blinds and central air-conditioning.
Conveniently located in the lobby of 24 North Hotel, with 145 guestrooms, retail, a shuttle to Old Town, and plenty of food & beverage options, your attendees will have everything they need to meet and enjoy their time in Key West.
Our Group Sales Department is eager to plan your meetings and events from beginning to end.
To find out more, complete an RFP or contact Sales@thekeyscollection.com.
Our meeting venues are accessible. For more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.
